References.description:
References are used to return entities referenced by fields of entities returned by read and query tasks.
References can be nested to return referenced entities of referenced entities.

selector.description: the field path used as a reference to an entity in the specified container

cont.description: the container storing the entities referenced by the specified selector

EntityError.description: Used by SyncResponse to return errors when mutating an entity by: create, upsert, patch and delete

type.description: error type when accessing an entity in a database

message.description: error details when accessing an entity

descriptions.ParseError:
Invalid JSON when reading an entity from database
can happen with key-value databases - e.g. file-system - as their values are not restricted to JSON
descriptions.ReadError:
Reading an entity from database failed
e.g. a corrupt file when using the file-system as database
descriptions.WriteError:
Writing an entity to database failed
e.g. the file is already in use by another process when using the file-system as database
descriptions.DeleteError:
Deleting an entity in database failed
e.g. the file is already in use by another process when using the file-system as database

cont.description: container name - not utilized by Protocol

count.description: number of ids - not utilized by Protocol
